idea-plugin.name: GitLab Mentions
idea-plugin.description:
GitLab Mentions provides @username auto‑completion for GitLab users when editing Markdown files.

Suggestions are loaded from members of a configured GitLab group via the REST API and cached for a configurable time‑to‑live (TTL).

You can set the GitLab host, personal access token, group ID, cache TTL and maximum number of suggestions under Settings → Tools → GitLab Mentions.
